Washed your hair yesterday and roots already greasy? Discover NEW Elvive Hydra Pure 72h Purifying Shampoo by L‚ÄôOr√©al Paris! Our formula is powered with Salicylic Acid, which helps remove excess oil and impurities & Hyaluronic Acid for a boost of moisture.

Features

Up To 72H Of A Purified Scalp & Hydrated Lengths

Product Specification

AQUA / WATER - SODIUM LAURETH SULFATE - COCAMIDOPROPYL BETAINE - PARFUM / FRAGRANCE - COCAMIDE MEA - SODIUM CHLORIDE - SODIUM BENZOATE - SODIUM HYDROXIDE - HYDROXYPROPYL GUAR HYDROXYPROPYLTRIMONIUM CHLORIDE - SODIUM HYALURONATE - SALICYLIC ACID - LIMONENE - CITRIC ACID - HEXYLENE GLYCOL

Product Uses

Apply on wet hair, massage your scalp and rinse. For optimal results, start your routine with the Hydra Pure Scalp Serum and finish with the Rehydrating Conditioner. In case of contact with eyes, rinse immediately and thoroughly.
